attributes.action: I want clear guidelines and care for people with EDS and better pain management
attributes.additional_details: Medical cannabis has proven to work for pain management I myself have come off 200mg of morphine per day and oramorph PRN with the help of THC and CBD again at great expense. Please help all the children who's parents get parenting classes or have their child taken away because of this condition and the ignorance of the NHS and social services. Awareness even for rheumatologists is extremely poor I saw 3 with no outcome please help us, we need you to stand up for our right to be treated fairly.
attributes.background: I am 32 years old by 23 I had seen 16 consultants up and down the country who all said the pain was in my head. I ended up having to go private to get my diagnosis at great expense. THIS SHOULD NOT HAVE TO BE THE CASE!

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/275249

You could start a new petition calling the legalising of cannabis for the treatment of all medical conditions, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
